SELECT COL.BOARD_SEQ, COL.BOARD_TYPE, COL.BOARD_TITLE, COL.BOARD_CONTENT, COL.BOARD_DATE, COL.NICK_NAME, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_IT_TECH_REPLY WHERE COL.BOARD_SEQ = TB_IT_TECH_REPLY.REPLY_BOARD_SEQ) AS REPLY_CNT FROM (SELECT BOARD_SEQ, BOARD_TYPE, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT, BOARD_DATE, NICK_NAME FROM TB_IT_TECH_BOARD AS BOARD JOIN (SELECT PROFILE_SEQ, NICK_NAME, RESIGN_YN FROM TB_PROFILE, TB_USER WHERE TB_PROFILE.USER_SEQ = TB_USER.USER_SEQ) AS PRO WHERE BOARD.BOARD_PROFILE_SEQ = PRO.PROFILE_SEQ AND PRO.RESIGN_YN = "N") AS COL ORDER BY BOARD_DATE DESC LIMIT #{start}, #{offset}

SELECT COL.BOARD_SEQ, COL.BOARD_TYPE, COL.BOARD_TITLE, COL.BOARD_CONTENT, COL.BOARD_DATE, COL.NICK_NAME, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_DEVELOP_STORY_REPLY AS REPLY JOIN (SELECT PROFILE_SEQ, NICK_NAME FROM TB_PROFILE, TB_USER WHERE TB_PROFILE.USER_SEQ = TB_USER.USER_SEQ AND TB_USER.RESIGN_YN = "N") AS PROFILE WHERE REPLY.REPLY_PROFILE_SEQ = PROFILE.PROFILE_SEQ AND REPLY.REPLY_BOARD_SEQ = COL.BOARD_SEQ) AS REPLY_CNT FROM (SELECT BOARD_SEQ, BOARD_TYPE, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT, BOARD_DATE, NICK_NAME FROM TB_DEVELOP_STORY_BOARD AS BOARD JOIN (SELECT PROFILE_SEQ, NICK_NAME, RESIGN_YN FROM TB_PROFILE, TB_USER WHERE TB_PROFILE.USER_SEQ = TB_USER.USER_SEQ) AS PRO WHERE BOARD.BOARD_PROFILE_SEQ = PRO.PROFILE_SEQ AND PRO.RESIGN_YN = "N") AS COL ORDER BY BOARD_DATE DESC LIMIT #{start}, #{offset}

SELECT BOARD_PROFILE_SEQ, BOARD_TYPE, BOARD_SEQ, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT, BOARD_DATE, NICK_NAME, REPLY_CNT FROM TB_PROFILE JOIN ((SELECT BOARD_PROFILE_SEQ, BOARD_TYPE, BOARD_SEQ, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT, BOARD_DATE, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_IT_TECH_REPLY WHERE BOARD_SEQ = TB_IT_TECH_REPLY.REPLY_BOARD_SEQ) AS REPLY_CNT FROM TB_IT_TECH_BOARD) UNION (SELECT BOARD_PROFILE_SEQ, BOARD_TYPE, BOARD_SEQ, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT, BOARD_DATE, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_DEVELOP_STORY_REPLY AS REPLY JOIN (SELECT PROFILE_SEQ, NICK_NAME FROM TB_PROFILE, TB_USER WHERE TB_PROFILE.USER_SEQ = TB_USER.USER_SEQ AND TB_USER.RESIGN_YN = "N") AS PROFILE WHERE REPLY.REPLY_PROFILE_SEQ = PROFILE.PROFILE_SEQ AND REPLY.REPLY_BOARD_SEQ = BOARD_SEQ) AS REPLY_CNT FROM TB_DEVELOP_STORY_BOARD)) AS BOARD ON BOARD.BOARD_PROFILE_SEQ = TB_PROFILE.PROFILE_SEQ AND BOARD_PROFILE_SEQ = #{profileSeq} ORDER BY BOARD_DATE DESC LIMIT #{start}, #{offset}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (SELECT * FROM TB_IT_TECH_BOARD UNION SELECT * FROM TB_DEVELOP_STORY_BOARD) AS BOARD WHERE BOARD_PROFILE_SEQ = #{profileSeq}

SELECT BOARD_SEQ, BOARD_TYPE, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT, BOARD_DATE, NICK_NAME FROM TB_IT_TECH_BOARD AS BOARD JOIN (SELECT PROFILE_SEQ, NICK_NAME, RESIGN_YN FROM TB_PROFILE, TB_USER WHERE TB_PROFILE.USER_SEQ = TB_USER.USER_SEQ) AS PRO WHERE BOARD.BOARD_PROFILE_SEQ = PRO.PROFILE_SEQ AND PRO.RESIGN_YN = "N" AND (BOARD.BOARD_TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchedWord},'%') OR BOARD_CONTENT4SEARCHING LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchedWord},'%')) ORDER BY BOARD_DATE DESC LIMIT #{start}, #{offset}

SELECT BOARD_SEQ, BOARD_TYPE, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT, BOARD_DATE, NICK_NAME FROM TB_DEVELOP_STORY_BOARD AS BOARD JOIN (SELECT PROFILE_SEQ, NICK_NAME, RESIGN_YN FROM TB_PROFILE, TB_USER WHERE TB_PROFILE.USER_SEQ = TB_USER.USER_SEQ) AS PRO WHERE BOARD.BOARD_PROFILE_SEQ = PRO.PROFILE_SEQ AND PRO.RESIGN_YN = "N" AND (BOARD.BOARD_TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchedWord},'%') OR BOARD_CONTENT4SEARCHING LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchedWord},'%')) ORDER BY BOARD_DATE DESC LIMIT #{start}, #{offset}

SELECT BOARD_TYPE, BOARD_SEQ, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT, BOARD_DATE, NICK_NAME FROM TB_USER, TB_PROFILE JOIN (SELECT BOARD_PROFILE_SEQ, BOARD_TYPE, BOARD_SEQ, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT, BOARD_DATE FROM TB_IT_TECH_BOARD UNION SELECT BOARD_PROFILE_SEQ, BOARD_TYPE, BOARD_SEQ, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT, BOARD_DATE FROM TB_DEVELOP_STORY_BOARD) AS BOARD ON BOARD.BOARD_PROFILE_SEQ = TB_PROFILE.PROFILE_SEQ WHERE TB_PROFILE.USER_SEQ = TB_USER.USER_SEQ AND TB_USER.RESIGN_YN = "N" ORDER BY BOARD_DATE DESC LIMIT 3

SELECT REPLY_DATE, REPLY_CONTENT, NICK_NAME, FILE_PATH, REPLY_RH_COIN, REPLY_SEQ FROM TB_IT_TECH_REPLY AS R, (select p.PROFILE_SEQ, p.NICK_NAME, f.FILE_PATH from TB_PROFILE p left outer join TB_FILE f on p.FILE_SEQ=f.FILE_SEQ) P WHERE P.PROFILE_SEQ = R.REPLY_PROFILE_SEQ AND R.REPLY_BOARD_SEQ = #{boardSeq} ORDER BY REPLY_DATE DESC;

SELECT BOARD_TYPE, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT, BOARD_DATE, NICK_NAME, FILE_PATH FROM TB_IT_TECH_BOARD AS BOARD JOIN (SELECT PROFILE_SEQ, NICK_NAME ,FILE_PATH FROM TB_PROFILE LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_FILE ON TB_PROFILE.FILE_SEQ = TB_FILE.FILE_SEQ) AS PROFILE WHERE BOARD.BOARD_PROFILE_SEQ = PROFILE.PROFILE_SEQ AND BOARD.BOARD_SEQ = #{boardSeq}

SELECT BOARD_TYPE, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT, BOARD_DATE, NICK_NAME, FILE_PATH FROM TB_DEVELOP_STORY_BOARD AS BOARD JOIN (SELECT PROFILE_SEQ, NICK_NAME, FILE_PATH FROM TB_PROFILE LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_FILE ON TB_PROFILE.FILE_SEQ = TB_FILE.FILE_SEQ) AS PROFILE WHERE BOARD.BOARD_PROFILE_SEQ = PROFILE.PROFILE_SEQ AND BOARD.BOARD_SEQ = #{boardSeq}

SELECT REPLY_DATE, REPLY_CONTENT, NICK_NAME, FILE_PATH, REPLY_RH_COIN, REPLY_SEQ FROM TB_DEVELOP_STORY_REPLY AS R JOIN (SELECT PROFILE_SEQ, NICK_NAME, RESIGN_YN, FILE_PATH FROM TB_USER AS U, TB_PROFILE AS P LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT FILE_SEQ, FILE_PATH FROM TB_FILE ) AS PRO ON P.FILE_SEQ = PRO.FILE_SEQ WHERE P.USER_SEQ = U.USER_SEQ) AS USERS ON R.REPLY_PROFILE_SEQ = USERS.PROFILE_SEQ AND REPLY_BOARD_SEQ = #{boardSeq} AND USERS.RESIGN_YN = "N" ORDER BY REPLY_DATE DESC;
